name: Star-Bored: Adventures in a Bureaucratic Dystopia
name_original: Star-Bored: Adventures in a Bureaucratic Dystopia
description:
Star-Bored: Adventures in a Bureaucratic Dystopia is an action, RPG and strategy game developed by Michael Flynn. It was originally released in 2015. Michael Flynn published the game.
You can play Star-Bored: Adventures in a Bureaucratic Dystopia on PC.
